team.name: Christine Laos
team.biography: Christine is IRF certified, has vast experience as a high-level Trip Leader. With 8 years of experience at national and international level, expert in rafting and safety techniques.

team.name: JP Riverson
team.biography: JP is our Inline Raft Trip Leader. With his 10 years of experience and IRF certification, JP is the most experienced rafting leader in our company. He has international experience in turbulent rivers such as Chile, Brazil, Argentina and others. JP is an excellent option that you must take

team.name: Han Kooki
team.biography: Han is a IRF certified in Safety Kayak. His experience sailing in national and international rivers qualify him as an excellent guide. Internationally awarded, Han is an expert in his field
